title: Which salivary gland is absent in human? - Quora

response.answer_text: The salivary glands of some species are modified to produce protein - Salivary amylase is found in many but not mean of all, birds and humans. Furthermore,the Venom gland of venomous snake & Gila monsters of some Shrews are modified salivary gland.In some insects are used to produce the biological protein like silks or glues.
